definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

pinyin: er4 lu:4 yi4 san1 ju4 qing2 suan1 na4

sentences.english: The properties of title adhesive comprising fully blocked isocyanate and polymer and additives was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種含全封閉異氰酸膠粘劑的性質。

sentences.english: A palladium phthalocyanine-PVC membrane electrode for thiocyanate ion was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研製了酞菁鈀PVC膜硫氰酸根離子選擇性電極。

sentences.english: Basic cleaning methods of NaSCN solution for PAN fiber have been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對硫氰酸鈉除雜的基本方法進行了簡要回顧。

sentences.english: The production expansion of evaporating equipment was introduced for solvent NaSCN in PAN fiber production.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了腈綸生產中溶劑硫氰酸鈉蒸發裝置的擴產改造。

sentences.english: The recent development of isocyanates by using green synthesis is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了近十年來異氰酸酯在綠色合成中的研究進展。

sentences.english: Situations of preparing isocyanate trimers at home and abroad are mainly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹國內外異氰酸酯三聚體的製備狀況。

sentences.english: At the same time, raw materials such as PAPI have been filtrated in the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我們對異氰酸酯等原材料也進行了試驗篩選。

sentences.english: Mainly contain isothiocyanate as the alive compositions.
sentences.chinese: 主要含有異硫氰酸鹽等活性成分。

sentences.english: The microsphere is prepared with diisocyanate as crosslinking agent and through condensation with cyclodextrin monomer.
sentences.chinese: 微球以二異氰酸酯爲交聯劑，與環糊精單體縮合而成。

sentences.english: Reaction of the isocyanic acid (HNCO) and isothiocyanic acid (HNCS) with ethylene radical;
sentences.chinese: 異氰酸及異硫氰酸與氯代乙烯自由基間的反應。

sentences.english: Reaction of the isocyanic acid (HNCO) and isothiocyanic acid (HNCS) with ethylene radical;
sentences.chinese: 異氰酸及異硫氰酸與氯代乙烯自由基間的反應。

sentences.english: The reaction kinetics of synthesizing aryl isocyanate by aryl amine and phosgene was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了芳胺和光氣反應生成異氰酸酯的反應動力學。

sentences.english: If a cherry pip is chewed, crushed, or somehow damaged, it automatically produces hydrogen cyanide.
sentences.chinese: 一旦櫻桃核被咀嚼或咬碎了，他就會自動產生氫氰酸。

sentences.english: The p-chlorophenyl isocyanate is synthesised by carbonyl chloride and p-chloroaniline.
sentences.chinese: 採用光氣與對氯苯胺合成對氯苯基異氰酸酯。

sentences.english: Broccoli and broccoli sprouts have the highest amount of the isothiocyanates.
sentences.chinese: 西蘭花和西蘭花芽中異硫氰酸鹽的含量是最高的。

sentences.english: In this method, the row material is manganous sulfate, which is preparing from leaching solution of pyrolusite.
sentences.chinese: 對硫氰酸鈉除雜的基本方法進行了簡要回顧。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
hydrochloric acid HCl/also written 鹽酸|盐酸
